PageWidgetPortable.Title: Visitas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>PORTAL_REP_CM_VISITAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedPageSize>20</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>false</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.AGENTEVENDAS IN (SELECT B.PESSOA FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS B WHERE B.HANDLE = @USUARIO)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/PortalRepresentante/a/Visitas/CadastroVisitas.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
